News.Summary: HDFC Bank receives RBI approval for Kaizad Bharucha's re-appointment as Deputy Managing Director for three years starting April 19, 2026, following board recommendation.

News.Title: HDFC Bank Gets Buy Rating with ₹1,150 Target
News.Summary: Prabhudas Lilladher maintains buy rating on HDFC Bank with target price of ₹1,150, citing strong Q3 performance with core PAT of ₹156.5 billion beating estimates by 5.9%.

News.Title: HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank attractive after underperformance
News.Summary: Market expert Nischal Maheshwari highlights banking sector's strong earnings outlook despite one-time provisions, citing attractive valuations after prolonged underperformance in large private banks.

News.Title: HDFC Bank Outperforms ICICI in Q3 Results
News.Summary: HDFC Bank reported 12% profit growth to ₹18,654 crore while ICICI Bank saw 4% decline to ₹11,318 crore. Both banks faced regulatory provisions for agricultural lending misclassification.

News.Title: HDFC Bank top pick, ICICI Bank next best: BNP Paribas
News.Summary: BNP Paribas analyst remains constructive on large private banks with HDFC Bank as top pick and ICICI Bank second, while maintaining caution on PSU banks despite recent rally.

News.Title: Citi Maintains Buy Rating on HDFC Bank Post Q3 Results
News.Summary: Citi retains its 'Buy' recommendation on HDFC Bank following Q3 results, while Motilal Oswal shows bullish stance on JSW Infrastructure amid India's expanding ports sector growth.

News.Title: HDFC Bank Sees ₹187.64 Cr NSE Block Trade
News.Summary: HDFC Bank executed another significant block trade on NSE worth ₹187.64 crores involving 2,018,275 shares at ₹929.70 per share, marking continued institutional activity.

News.Title: HDFC Bank's margin recovery hinges on deposit growth
News.Summary: Axis Securities analyst highlights challenges in HDFC Bank achieving 90% loan-to-deposit ratio by FY27, while noting positive margin improvement and stable credit costs despite one-off provisions.

News.Title: Bernstein Sets HDFC Bank Target at ₹1,200
News.Summary: Investment firm Bernstein maintains outperform rating on HDFC Bank with price target of ₹1,200, though detailed analysis unavailable.

News.Title: HDFC Bank Plans Margin Boost in 2-3 Years
News.Summary: HDFC Bank outlines strategy to enhance profit margins through fund cost reduction, time deposit adjustments, lower borrowing, and increased CASA growth over the next two to three years.

News.Title: HDFC Bank shares fall 0.91% despite Q3 profit growth
News.Summary: HDFC Bank shares declined to ₹922.60 despite 11% YoY profit growth to ₹18,654 crore. Mixed analyst views emerge with Elara upgrading to 'Buy' while JM Financial downgrades to 'Add'.

News.Title: HDFC Bank Targets Higher Loan Growth For FY27
News.Summary: HDFC Bank aims to surpass system growth of 12%-13% in FY27 while reducing loan-to-deposit ratio to 85%-90%, outlining aggressive expansion strategy with prudent liability management.

News.Title: HDFC Bank Expects Faster Q4 Deposit Growth
News.Summary: HDFC Bank anticipates accelerated deposit growth in Q4 matching revenue growth, supported by new accounts and diverse products, while limiting branch expansion to focus on stabilizing existing 4,800 branches.

News.Title: HDFC Bank Q3 Preview: PAT Growth Up to 13% YoY Expected
News.Summary: HDFC Bank set to announce Q3 earnings on January 17, with brokerages estimating net profit growth of 6-13% YoY and NII growth of 4.5-8%. Focus remains on deposit mobilisation and margin trajectory.

News.Title: HDFC Bank Cuts Infinia Card Rewards from Jan 16
News.Summary: HDFC Bank reduces Infinia credit card rewards on SmartBuy platform from 5X to 3X points, cutting effective reward rate from 16.5% to 10% starting January 16, 2026.

News.Title: HDFC Bank shares flat despite CLSA's bullish call
News.Summary: HDFC Bank shares traded flat after initial gains despite CLSA reiterating 'Outperform' rating with ₹1,200 target price, citing 28% upside potential amid temporary concerns over deposit growth.

News.Title: CLSA Sets HDFC Bank Target at ₹1,200 Amid Optimism
News.Summary: Global brokerage CLSA maintains positive outlook on HDFC Bank, setting target at ₹1,200 while dismissing investor concerns about deposit growth and margin pressures as temporary issues.

News.Title: HDFC Bank Q3FY26 Earnings Call Set for January 17
News.Summary: HDFC Bank announces earnings call scheduled for January 17, 2026 at 6 PM IST to discuss Q3FY26 financial results with analysts and investors, featuring senior management participation.

News.Title: HDFC Bank Shares Drop 1% in Sixth Straight Session
News.Summary: HDFC Bank shares declined nearly 1% on Monday, January 12, extending losses to six consecutive trading sessions as the stock continues to face downward pressure in the market.
